title: An Act to protect unpaid interns, volunteers, and independent contractors from sexual harassment and other forms of discrimination

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Lovely, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1172) of Joan B. Lovely for legislation to protect unpaid interns, volunteers, and independent contractors from sexual harassment and other forms of discrimination.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
